description: This file defines a Pydantic model for movie scripts, sets up an agent to generate such scripts using a specific model, and includes code to run and print the response for a given input.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing the structure of a movie script, including fields for name, setting, ending, genre, characters, and storyline.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method called on the agent to generate and print a movie script based on the input 'New York'.
